name: TimeOut! Demo
description:
Hey as they are here Pollux Games presenting a new project that's in Demo version, or Beta don't know how the versions work. This version was made in time as 3 days because it was less than a month working as 1 hour and wasn't daily. 

This game is about a man who tries to climb EVEREST, although of course it will be easy having a good player on his side... 

This game like others has bugs but being a slightly early version has more, I hope this doesn't worsen its possible unbearable gaming experience. I can't give a summary of the game because I don't even know its story.

 just enjoy it

 or regret downloading it, u will know...

This game is in development so it lacks things like:

-Power Up mechanic

-History

-Some redesigns

-Sounds

-Better music (maybe)

The controls are:

A : left

D : right

O : Jump

the requirements are:

-like 40 mb of space

-A windows pc

-A keyboard

until next time
